title: Roundup: New road, gravel & MTB tires by Panaracer, Schwalbe, Vee, Mitas & Michelin
content:
Eurobike 2021 had quite a few new treads on display. Many brands, though, kept it simple with new sizes and options for some of their existing treads, or only had a couple new things to seeâ€¦but still interesting, like a new eMTB specific rubber compound, almost MTB-sized gravel tires, and a wider option for roadies

The post Roundup: New road, gravel & MTB tires by Panaracer, Schwalbe, Vee, Mitas & Michelin appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
